shortlist.name: Hill Station (Fr)
shortlist.rationale: Arrives in peak form, having won last time out after a string of consistent placed efforts. Connections are strong at this level and the current odds reflect both form and stable confidence. No sign of regression and should be suited by conditions.

shortlist.name: Jorebel (Fr)
shortlist.rationale: Lightly raced this season but showed ability in previous campaign, including a recent placed effort. Trainer excels with similar types at this venue. Market support suggests readiness and potential for improvement off a break.

shortlist.name: Lermoos Legend
shortlist.odds_note: 13/8 SBK, 3.15 exchange (clear favourite, not a longshot)
shortlist.rationale: Arrives in peak form with two consecutive wins following a string of runner-up finishes, indicating consistency and readiness. Sean Bowen is a top jockey, and the odds reflect strong market confidence. No signs of decline in recent runs, suggesting the horse is still at its pinnacle[1][4].

shortlist.name: Somespring Special (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Recent form includes a win and a close second, with only a fall last time out interrupting otherwise solid performances. Trained by a respected yard, and odds suggest genuine support. No major improvement needed, already competitive at this level[1][4].

shortlist.name: Galactique (Fr)
shortlist.rationale: Strong recent form with a runner-up finish last time out, representing the in-form Moore yard. The odds indicate market confidence and the horse is proven at this level. Connections are reliable and the horse is expected to be at peak fitness.

shortlist.name: Bouboule
shortlist.rationale: Well-supported in the market despite lacking recent form figures, suggesting strong stable confidence and potential for improvement. Jockey and trainer are both respected, and the odds reflect genuine winning claims.

shortlist.name: Cawthorne Banker (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Returned to form with a win last time out after a patchy spell, indicating peak fitness and confidence. The O'Neill team is respected at this level, and the market support is strong. Recent form is the most progressive in the field.

shortlist.name: Fascinating Lips (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Represents the in-form Moore yard, which excels at Fontwell. Although lacking recent form figures, the market confidence and connections suggest readiness and ability at this level. Not discounted given stable's local record and current odds.

shortlist.name: Ivane (Fr)
shortlist.odds_note: Strong market support (9/4 SBK, 3.3 exchange), clear favourite.
shortlist.rationale: Consistent recent form with a win and placed efforts in last three starts. Connections are in good order and the horse is proven at this level. Odds reflect strong confidence from both bookmakers and exchange, indicating stable support.

shortlist.name: Faded Fantasy (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: Solid value (15/4 SBK, 5.3 exchange), not a longshot.
shortlist.rationale: Recent form is progressive, with two wins and a second in last three runs, showing clear improvement and reliability. Trainer is in form and the horse is well-handicapped for this contest.

shortlist.name: Gold Link (Fr)
shortlist.odds_note: Strong favourite at 6/5 (exchange 2.22), clear market leader.
shortlist.rationale: Arrives in peak form after a decisive win last time and consistent recent placings. Top jockey and trainer combination adds confidence. No signs of regression and profile fits a horse holding form at its peak.

shortlist.name: Sun Joy (Fr)
shortlist.odds_note: Second choice in market at 9/4 (exchange 3.4), clear of outsiders.
shortlist.rationale: Returned from a break with a strong runner-up effort, suggesting fitness and readiness. Trainer in good form and horse has shown ability at this level. Consistent enough to be a danger if favourite underperforms.

shortlist.name: One More Bottle
shortlist.rationale: Consistent recent form with three consecutive third-place finishes, indicating reliability and competitiveness at this level. Current odds reflect strong market support and suggest a high probability of contending. Connections are in good order and the horse is holding form well, with no signs of decline.

shortlist.name: James Park Woods (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Arrives in peak form with back-to-back wins, showing clear improvement and ability to handle similar company. Odds are competitive and connections have a positive recent strike rate. The horse’s upward trajectory and proven winning ability make it a strong contender.

shortlist.name: Passing Thought
shortlist.odds_note: Strong favourite at 5/4 (exchange 2.58), clear market leader.
shortlist.rationale: Showed clear progression with a 2nd last time out after a promising debut 7th; top connections and current odds reflect strong market confidence. No signs of regression and form suggests further improvement likely.

shortlist.name: Showtown (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent performer with two consecutive runner-up finishes; proven ability to place and likely to be in the mix again. Trainer in good form and horse is holding condition well.

shortlist.name: Nevasca Cinza
shortlist.odds_note: Third in the market at 9/5 (exchange 3.25), respected.
shortlist.rationale: Debut third suggests ability and scope for improvement; connections capable and market support is notable. Should progress with experience.

shortlist.name: Dandy Style (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: 13/8 SBK, 2.94 Exchange (solid favourite, not a longshot)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent recent form with a win and two placings in last four starts. Current odds indicate strong market support and connections are reliable at this level. No signs of decline in form and should be suited by conditions.

shortlist.name: Jungle Monarch (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Has shown ability with consistent finishes in competitive races. Trainer is in good form and the horse’s profile suggests readiness to win soon. Odds represent fair value for a likely contender.

shortlist.name: Mighty Magnus (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Recent win and two placings in last five runs indicate solid form. Trainer and jockey combination is respected, and odds suggest market confidence. No major improvement needed to contend.

shortlist.name: Mafting
shortlist.rationale: Consistent performer with two wins and a second in last six starts, trained by O'Meara who excels with handicappers. Tudhope is a top jockey at this venue. Recent form suggests holding level, not declining, and odds indicate strong market confidence.

shortlist.name: Chico Magnifica (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: 85/40 SBK, 3.6 exchange (favoured, close to Mafting in market)
shortlist.rationale: Progressive profile with two wins from last three starts, lightly raced and open to further improvement. Burke/Lee combination is reliable, and odds reflect strong support. Recent win shows readiness and fitness.

shortlist.name: Impressor (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: 10/3 SBK, 4.4 exchange (clear market leader, not an outsider)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent recent form with a close 2nd and 3rd in last two starts, suggesting the horse is peaking at the right time. Market support is strong, indicating confidence from connections and punters. No need for major improvement to win here.

shortlist.name: Military Girl (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: 4/1 SBK, 6.6 exchange (solidly in the market, not a longshot)
shortlist.rationale: Has shown ability at this level with a win and placed efforts earlier this season. Recent runs have been respectable in stronger company. Trainer and jockey are both reliable, and the odds reflect realistic winning chance.

shortlist.name: Digital (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Recent form figures are a bit mixed but latest run was a step back in the right direction. Has run well at this level before and is attractively priced. Connections are capable and the market suggests a live chance.

shortlist.name: Simply Blue
shortlist.odds_note: 3/1 SBK, 4.5 exchange (solid market support, not an outsider)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent recent form with multiple placings, suggesting reliability at this level. Connections are competent, and current odds indicate strong market confidence. No need for major improvement to contend.

shortlist.name: Mister Sky Blue (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Has been running consistently well, regularly finishing in the frame. Market position as favourite/near-favourite reflects strong expectations. Recent form is solid and connections are in good order.

shortlist.name: I Need Your Love
shortlist.rationale: Early season form was strong, and recent efforts suggest a return to form is possible. Connections are respected and odds indicate market confidence. Does not require major improvement to win.

shortlist.name: Kode Secret (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent recent form with two solid placed efforts in last four starts, indicating reliability and readiness. Top connections with David Allan and Tim Easterby, both proven at this level. Current odds reflect market confidence and value for a likely winner.

shortlist.name: The Gay Blade
shortlist.rationale: Has shown competitive form with multiple places this season, suggesting consistency and ability to contend. Connections are solid, and odds offer reasonable value for a horse likely to be in the mix.

shortlist.name: Bear To Dream (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: 5/2 SBK, 5.1 exchange (clear market leader, not an outsider)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent recent form with multiple placings and wins, indicating reliability and current fitness. Market support is strong, suggesting confidence from connections and punters. No sign of decline in recent runs.

shortlist.name: Candle Of Time
shortlist.rationale: Solid market position and trained by a respected yard. Recent form includes a close fourth and third, suggesting ability to be competitive at this level. Connections are capable of readying one for a win in this grade.

shortlist.name: All Too Beautiful
shortlist.rationale: Consistent recent form with multiple top-three finishes and a win two starts back. Connections are solid and the odds reflect strong market support. No signs of declining form and appears to be holding peak condition.

shortlist.name: Ahamoment (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Recent form is progressive, with a close second last time and consistent placings. Trainer/jockey combination is respected and the odds indicate genuine market confidence. No major improvement needed to contend.

shortlist.name: Shark Two One
shortlist.odds_note: 11/4 SBK, 4.5 Exchange (third in market, not a longshot)
shortlist.rationale: Ultra-consistent profile with a string of placed efforts and a win four starts back. Reliable performer at this level, connections capable, and odds offer fair value for a horse that rarely runs a bad race.

shortlist.name: Miss Scott (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Represents the top Gosden stable with a leading jockey; market support is notable for a debutante in this context. Connections often ready first-time-out winners at this level, and the lack of form is not a negative given the stable's record with newcomers.

shortlist.name: Sydney Rock
shortlist.odds_note: 7/2 SBK, 4.9 exchange (solid, clear second choice in market)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent profile with two runner-up finishes, suggesting reliability and readiness to win. Proven ability to handle race conditions and distance; market position confirms strong expectations. No sign of regression in form.

shortlist.name: Spacewoman
shortlist.odds_note: 11/4 SBK, 3.8 exchange (clear favourite, solid market support)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent recent form with three consecutive placed efforts, suggesting reliability and readiness to win. Short odds reflect strong market confidence. Connections are capable and the filly is likely to be at peak fitness.

shortlist.name: Perfect Location
shortlist.rationale: Recent win two starts ago shows ability; last run can be forgiven if conditions or trip were unsuitable. Rossa Ryan is a positive jockey booking. Odds offer fair value for a lightly raced improver.

shortlist.name: Go Rimbaud
shortlist.rationale: Represents top connections with Gosden yard, which excels with unexposed types at Leicester. Market support is strong, indicating confidence despite lack of public form. Jockey Havlin is reliable for the stable and often rides leading chances.

shortlist.name: Eklleem
shortlist.rationale: Trained by William Haggas, who is highly effective with debutants and progressive types. Tom Marquand is a top jockey, and the odds suggest strong market respect. Connections and price indicate genuine winning potential.

shortlist.name: Moving Shadow
shortlist.odds_note: 16/5 SBK, 4.8 exchange (third in market, not a longshot)
shortlist.rationale: K. R. Burke is adept with improving horses and Sam James is a capable rider. Market position suggests this runner is expected to be competitive, and the odds offer reasonable value for a horse from a respected yard.

shortlist.name: Majaz
shortlist.rationale: Consistent runner with four consecutive second-place finishes, indicating reliability and readiness to win. Trained by Roger Varian, a top yard, and partnered with Ray Dawson. Current odds reflect market confidence and value for a horse knocking on the door at this level.

shortlist.name: Participle
shortlist.rationale: Solid form with a second and two recent third-place finishes. Trained by Ralph Beckett, known for improving types, and not far off the favourite on ratings. Odds are competitive for a horse with proven ability at this grade.

shortlist.name: Dream Illusion
shortlist.odds_note: 85/40 SBK, 3.5 exchange (solid market support, clear second-favorite)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent performer at this level with multiple recent placings and a win in the last eight starts. The form figures show reliability and competitiveness in similar company. Trainer K. R. Burke is respected, and current odds reflect strong market confidence without being overbet.

shortlist.name: Secret Sonata
shortlist.odds_note: 2/1 SBK, 3.8 exchange (favorite, but not prohibitively short)
shortlist.rationale: Progressive profile with three consecutive placed efforts, suggesting a win is imminent. Trained by Andrew Balding, who excels with this type of runner. The market has made this horse favorite, indicating strong expectation of further improvement and suitability for this contest.

shortlist.name: Kranjcar (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Arrives in peak form with three consecutive wins, indicating strong current condition and ability to hold form at this level. George Boughey is a respected trainer, and the odds reflect market confidence. No signs of decline in recent runs.

shortlist.name: Connie's Rose
shortlist.rationale: Consistent performer with a recent win and multiple placings, showing reliability and competitiveness. Connections are in good form, and the odds offer reasonable value for a horse with proven consistency.

shortlist.name: On Edge
shortlist.rationale: Recent form includes two runner-up finishes, indicating the horse is knocking on the door for a win. Has shown adaptability and competitiveness at this level, and connections are capable. Odds are fair for a horse with strong recent efforts.

shortlist.name: Gretna Dreams (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Arrives in peak form with back-to-back wins, showing clear progression and adaptability. Connections are solid, and current odds reflect strong market confidence. Recent form figures indicate a horse at its pinnacle, not needing major improvement.

shortlist.name: Romantic Spirit (Fr)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent performer with multiple wins this season and competitive recent placings. Trainer and jockey are reliable at this level. Form suggests the horse is holding condition and remains competitive in this grade.

shortlist.name: Lady Of The Isles (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Progressive profile with improving form figures and top jockey booking. While not as exposed as others, recent runs suggest readiness to peak. Odds indicate market respect and potential for further improvement without needing a major leap.

shortlist.name: Mimi's Magic
shortlist.rationale: Progressive profile with a close second last time and a solid sixth prior, indicating improvement and readiness. Hollie Doyle is a top jockey, and Ed Dunlop is in good form. The odds reflect strong market support, and the filly does not require major improvement to win.

shortlist.name: Anywaythewindblows
shortlist.odds_note: Second choice in market; 11/5 SBK, 4.8 exchange
shortlist.rationale: Consistent recent form with a second and a seventh, suggesting reliability at this level. Rob Hornby is a capable jockey, and the trainer has a good record with similar types. Odds indicate strong market respect and realistic winning chance.

shortlist.name: Midnight Rodeo (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: 1/1 SBK, 2.18 exchange (clear favourite, strong market support)
shortlist.rationale: Arrives in peak form with back-to-back wins, suggesting clear improvement and readiness. The odds reflect strong confidence from the market, and the recent form is the best in the field. No signs of regression and connections are in good order.

shortlist.name: Priestess
shortlist.odds_note: 11/5 SBK, 3.85 exchange (solid second choice, well clear of outsiders)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent recent form with a win last time out and placed efforts prior. Odds indicate respect from the market and she is the only other runner with both form and price to suggest a realistic winning chance. Connections are capable and the profile is progressive.

shortlist.name: Hint Of The Jungle (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: 9/4 SBK, 4.7 exchange (clear market leader, not an outsider)
shortlist.rationale: Arrives in peak form, having won last time out and showing progressive figures this campaign. Market support is strong, indicating confidence. Connections are capable at this level and the recent win suggests readiness to follow up.

shortlist.name: Diligent Henry
shortlist.rationale: Consistent profile with multiple placed efforts this season and a win three starts ago. Hollie Doyle is a notable jockey booking, adding further confidence. Recent form is solid and odds reflect strong market respect.

shortlist.name: Sands Of Dubai
shortlist.rationale: Returned to form with a runner-up finish last time, suggesting a return to peak. Trained by Richard Fahey, who excels with this type, and Joe Fanning is a positive jockey booking. Profile fits for a strong run at this level.

shortlist.name: Penelope Valentine
shortlist.odds_note: Favoured in the market (9/5 SBK, 3.05 exchange)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent recent form with multiple placed efforts, including a close third last time. Market support is strong, suggesting confidence from connections. Jockey and trainer both have solid records at this level.

shortlist.name: Valadero (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Ultra-consistent with three consecutive runner-up finishes, indicating readiness to win. Proven at the trip and surface, and connections are respected. Odds offer fair value for a horse knocking on the door.

shortlist.name: Backspin (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent performer at this level, recent runner-up effort signals current form is solid. Trainer Richard Hughes is reliable at Wolverhampton and the market support is significant, indicating stable confidence.

shortlist.name: Packetofbiscuits
shortlist.rationale: Has been holding form well with two recent wins and a third; last run can be forgiven. Connections are in good form and the odds reflect genuine market respect.

shortlist.name: Fouette (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Lightly raced and open to improvement after a break; previous win suggests ability. Exchange odds much shorter than fixed, indicating smart money and possible value.

shortlist.name: Lexington Jet (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Placed in last three starts, showing consistency at this level. Trainer has a good record with similar types at Wolverhampton and the odds are fair for a horse with proven recent form.

shortlist.name: Young Endless
shortlist.odds_note: 11/5 SBK, 3.85 exchange (clear market leader, not an outsider)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent recent form at this level, including a win and multiple placings. Hollie Doyle is a top jockey booking, and the horse is trading as favourite, indicating strong market confidence. No signs of regression in form and proven at the track.

shortlist.name: Inlet
shortlist.odds_note: 11/4 SBK, 4.2 exchange (solid second-favourite, not an outsider)
shortlist.rationale: Very consistent profile with several recent placings at this grade. Shoemark is a reliable jockey, and the horse has been running well without needing major improvement. Market support is strong, suggesting connections expect a big run.

shortlist.name: Sneaky Blinder (Fr)
shortlist.odds_note: 4/1 SBK, 6 exchange (well-supported, within main market group)
shortlist.rationale: Has hit the frame repeatedly in recent starts, showing a high level of consistency. Luke Morris is a capable jockey for this type of race. The horse is holding form and is not a longshot by market standards.

shortlist.name: Pergola (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: 13/8 SBK, 3.05 exchange (clear favourite, strong market support)
shortlist.rationale: Progressive profile with a recent win and a solid second last time out. Trained by William Haggas, who excels with improving handicappers, and partnered by a top jockey. Form is consistent and competitive for this grade. Market support confirms strong chance.

shortlist.name: Detroit Lion (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent in competitive handicaps, regularly placing and running well in similar company. Trained by Richard Hannon, a reliable source of winners at this level. Recent form suggests he holds his form well and is suited to the track.

shortlist.name: Neoma
shortlist.rationale: Consistent filly with multiple placed efforts in recent starts. Trained by Charlie Johnston, who is adept with all-weather runners. Has shown enough ability to be competitive and is unlikely to need major improvement to feature.

shortlist.name: Trojan Truth
shortlist.rationale: Won three in a row earlier this summer and latest run can be forgiven in a stronger race. Proven winner at this level and retains the services of a capable jockey. Remains on the shortlist due to recent winning form and market respect.

shortlist.name: Nordic Glory (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: 5/2 SBK, 4.8 exchange (clear market leader, not an outsider)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent recent form with multiple placings and a win in last six starts. Market support reflects strong chance. Connections are in form and the horse is proven at this level.

shortlist.name: Under Curfew
shortlist.rationale: Solid recent form with several competitive efforts in similar company. Exchange market support is notable. Trainer is adept at placing horses on the all-weather.

shortlist.name: Noodles
shortlist.odds_note: 7/4 (SBK), clear market leader, not an outsider
shortlist.rationale: Consistent recent form in context of this field, with a third and fourth in last four starts. Market support is strong, indicating confidence. Connections are solid and the horse has shown ability at this level. No major improvement needed to win here.

shortlist.name: Idiocracy (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: 9/4 (SBK), second choice in market, not an outsider
shortlist.rationale: Represents a top stable and has been running respectably in similar company. Recent form is competitive for this grade, and the odds reflect genuine market respect. No evidence that a major leap forward is required to contend.

shortlist.name: Win Me Over (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: 13/8 SBK, 2.76 exchange (clear favourite, solid market support)
shortlist.rationale: Progressive profile with a strong second last time, representing top connections (Aidan O'Brien/W. M. Lordan). The form is improving and the horse is well found in the market, indicating confidence from punters and connections. No signs of needing major improvement to win at this level.

shortlist.name: Grecian Power (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Promising debut third, showing immediate ability. The market has reacted positively (exchange odds notably short), suggesting strong expectations for improvement. Trainer Edward Lynam is adept with this type, and the horse does not require major improvement to contend.

shortlist.name: Lady Pagasa (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent recent form with multiple placings, including two this season; trained by a top yard and partnered by a reliable jockey. Profile suggests she is holding her form and is likely to run her race again.

shortlist.name: Wegotogether (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Progressive profile with improving form figures and a strong finish last time. Trainer in good form and jockey is capable. Looks ready to peak and is well treated by the market.

shortlist.name: Bowman (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Recent win and a solid third last time indicate current form. Connections are shrewd and the jockey booking is notable. Has shown ability to win at this level and is not exposed.

shortlist.name: Irish Rumour (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent placer this season, holding form well in competitive handicaps. Has the right profile for this type of race and is well respected by the market.

shortlist.name: Anvika (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent recent form with multiple placings, suggesting reliability and readiness to win. Connections are capable, and current odds reflect strong market support without being overbet.

shortlist.name: Serialise (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: 5/1 (well found in market, not an outsider)
shortlist.rationale: Has shown ability at this level with a win and several placings earlier in the season. Trainer is respected, and the horse’s profile suggests a return to form is possible in this company.

shortlist.name: Greatest Drama (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Recent form figures show improvement, with a close fourth and third in last two starts. Trainer is in good form and the horse is peaking at the right time.

shortlist.name: Luscious (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Lightly raced this season with a win three starts back. Jockey-trainer combination is notable, and the horse has scope for further progress.

shortlist.name: Howd'yadoit (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Progressive profile with two consecutive wins, showing consistent improvement. Top connections with a leading jockey and trainer. Current odds reflect strong confidence from the market and form is peaking at the right time.

shortlist.name: Charles Fort
shortlist.rationale: Recent win signals upward trajectory and proven ability at this level. Trained by Aidan O'Brien, whose runners are always respected at Fairyhouse. Jockey booking is notable and odds indicate genuine market support.

shortlist.name: Morehampton (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent form with a win and two placed efforts in last three starts. Trainer and jockey combination is reliable, and odds offer value for a runner with proven ability to hit the frame.

shortlist.name: Cactus (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent recent form with two placings in last three starts, showing progression and reliability. Trained by Aidan O'Brien, a top yard, and current odds indicate strong market support. Connections and form profile suggest readiness to win at this level.

shortlist.name: Raphello (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Placed twice in last four runs, showing consistency at this grade. Trained by Joseph O'Brien, another leading stable, and market odds reflect strong support. Reliable form and top connections make this runner a major contender.

shortlist.name: Asdana (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: Current favourite, 7/2 SBK, solid exchange price.
shortlist.rationale: Arrives in peak form with a recent win and consistent placings, indicating strong current condition. Trainer W. McCreery is respected, and the odds reflect market confidence. No signs of decline and no need for major improvement.

shortlist.name: Are You In Or Out (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: Second favourite, 9/2 SBK, exchange price suggests solid support.
shortlist.rationale: Recent win and placed efforts show ability at this level. Jockey C. T. Keane is a notable booking, and the form is progressive. Connections are strong and the horse is well found in the market.

shortlist.name: Noble Nation (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Recent win two starts back and a solid reappearance suggest fitness and ability. Trainer has a good record with similar types, and the odds indicate market respect. No major improvement needed.

shortlist.name: Velvet Skies (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: 13/2 SBK, exchange price in line with market.
shortlist.rationale: Consistent form in competitive handicaps, with several placed efforts. Jockey booking is positive and the horse is proven at the trip. Market support is notable.

shortlist.name: Now Maybe (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: 15/8 SBK, 3.35 exchange (clear favourite, strong market support)
shortlist.rationale: Represents a top stable with a leading jockey; market leader in a weak maiden, suggesting strong confidence despite lack of public form. Connections are highly respected and often target these races successfully.

shortlist.name: Castelluccia (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: 16/5 SBK, 5.1 exchange (solid second choice in market)
shortlist.rationale: Has placed form (2nd two starts back) and is consistently supported in the market. Proven ability to run well at this level and holds a clear edge over most rivals on exposed form.

shortlist.name: Cherry Hill Girl (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: 7/2 SBK, 5.1 exchange (well found in market, not dismissed)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent filly with two fair runs in similar company; market respect and no need for major improvement to feature. Connections capable in this grade.

shortlist.name: Touted Plan (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: 11/2 SBK, 5.9 exchange (solid market support, not an outsider)
shortlist.rationale: Recent winner two starts back and followed up with a respectable fifth, indicating current form and ability to compete at this level. Connections are reliable and the odds reflect genuine market respect. No need for major improvement to feature.

shortlist.name: Dragon Of Malta (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: 11/2 SBK, 6 exchange (well found in the market)
shortlist.rationale: Runner-up last time out, showing a return to form. Consistent at this level and market position suggests strong support. No evidence of decline and recent figures are competitive for this grade.

shortlist.name: Racing Royalty
shortlist.odds_note: 6/1 SBK, 6.6 exchange (prominent in betting, not an outsider)
shortlist.rationale: Placed in two of last four starts and ran well last time, indicating reliability and readiness. Jockey booking is positive and form is holding up well. Odds suggest market confidence.

shortlist.name: Moon Reign
shortlist.rationale: Represents a top stable, showed promise on debut (4th) and is expected to improve significantly for that experience. Market support is strong, indicating confidence from connections and punters.

shortlist.name: Naples (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Progressive profile with a close 2nd last time out, suggesting readiness to win. Trainer is in good form and the horse is well found in the market, indicating strong expectations.

shortlist.name: Joyful Princess (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: 9/2 SBK, 1.11 exchange (exchange price likely data error, SBK price competitive)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent performer with multiple placings at this level. Connections are respected and the horse has the experience edge. Should be in the mix if holding form.

shortlist.name: Presence (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Presence has shown clear recent improvement, placing third last time out after a string of unplaced efforts. The switch to a top jockey and trainer combination is notable, and the market support is strong, indicating confidence from connections. The horse is peaking at the right time and has the best recent placing in the field.

shortlist.name: Flying Fortress
shortlist.rationale: Flying Fortress has consistently run well in competitive handicaps, with multiple placings and a win this season. The form is reliable and the trainer is in good order. While not the favourite, the odds offer fair value for a horse with proven ability at this level.

shortlist.name: Grey Leader (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Grey Leader has mixed form but has run well in higher grade races and is now dropping in class. The recent fourth and second place finishes suggest the horse is competitive and could be suited by conditions. Connections are respected and the odds are fair for a horse with upside.

shortlist.name: Coulstys Way (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent recent form with multiple placings and a win in last eight starts. Proven ability at this level and holding form well, with a top jockey booked. Connections are reliable and odds indicate strong market support.

shortlist.name: Chica Guerrera (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Recent win and solid form turnaround after a patchy spell, suggesting improvement and readiness. Trainer has a good record with similar types and odds reflect genuine chance.

shortlist.name: Earthsong (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Progressive profile with a promising last run (3rd), indicating upward trajectory. Trainer and jockey combination is respected, and market position confirms expectations for further improvement.

shortlist.name: Starford (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Progressive profile with two recent wins and a runner-up finish last time; trained by Joseph O'Brien and ridden by a top jockey. Consistent, improving, and connections are in form. No need for major improvement to win here.

shortlist.name: Granite Bay
shortlist.rationale: Consistent performer with multiple recent wins and placed efforts. Latest runs show reliability at this level. Market support and solid form make this runner a strong contender.

shortlist.name: Cristal Clere (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Ultra-consistent with back-to-back seconds and placed in four of last five starts. Reliable, holding form, and connections capable. Should be in the mix again without needing major improvement.

shortlist.name: Smooth Tom (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Recent form includes a win and a third this season. Has shown ability at this level and is not exposed as needing major improvement. Market position suggests stable confidence.

shortlist.name: Jannah Star (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent recent form with three consecutive placings, including two seconds and a third, indicating reliability and readiness. Trained by Joseph O'Brien, a top trainer, and partnered with a capable jockey. Short odds reflect strong market confidence and form credentials.

shortlist.name: Sears Crossing (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: 10/3 (sbk), 1.1 (exchange) – solid second-favorite, well found in market
shortlist.rationale: Progressive profile with improved recent form, finishing second last time out. Represents a strong trainer-jockey combination. Odds indicate respect from the market and suggest a likely contender if the favorite underperforms.

shortlist.name: Generous Support (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent in the frame with recent third and fourth placings, showing reliability at this level. Trained by Jim Bolger, a proven source of winners, and the odds suggest market confidence. Should be competitive for the win or place.

shortlist.name: Glady Eagle (Ire)
shortlist.rationale: Represents top connections (W. P. Mullins), has recent placed form after a win last season, and is strongly supported in the market. Mullins-trained runners at Listowel are typically well-prepared and competitive at this level.

shortlist.name: Nita (Ger)
shortlist.odds_note: 6/1 SBK, 2.02 exchange (solid value, not a longshot)
shortlist.rationale: Early season form was excellent (multiple wins and places), and recent runs suggest a return to form is possible. Trainer has a good record with similar types, and current odds offer value for a horse proven at this level.

shortlist.name: Plunkett Street
shortlist.rationale: Consistent recent form including a win and placed efforts this season. Jockey/trainer combination is reliable, and the horse has shown ability to handle similar company. Odds are fair for a runner with proven consistency.

shortlist.name: Prins Jaspar (Saf)
shortlist.rationale: Strong market support as the overwhelming favourite. Recent form figures of 7 and 8 suggest consistency at a competitive level, and connections are reliable. No major negatives in profile, and the odds indicate high confidence from both bookmakers and exchange markets.

shortlist.name: Siriano (Saf)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent recent form with a third last time out, and has shown ability to place regularly. Top jockey booking in Richard Fourie adds further confidence. Market position suggests strong chance if favourite underperforms.

shortlist.name: Sliver Of Sunshine (Saf)
shortlist.rationale: Well-supported in the market despite lacking published form, indicating positive stable reports or strong debut expectations. Trainer and jockey combination is respected locally, and odds suggest genuine win chance.

shortlist.name: Gold Giboski (Saf)
shortlist.odds_note: Clear, strong favourite at 1.26 on exchange.
shortlist.rationale: Consistent recent form with three consecutive placings and a top local jockey/trainer combination. The horse is repeatedly knocking on the door for a win, and the market strongly supports its chance. No signs of declining form and connections are highly reliable.

shortlist.name: Digby (Saf)
shortlist.rationale: Solid recent form, finishing close up in latest starts and showing improvement. The odds indicate clear market respect, and the horse does not require major improvement to be competitive. Represents value as the main threat to the favourite.

shortlist.name: Chance Encounter (Saf)
shortlist.odds_note: Very strong favourite at 1.26 on exchange.
shortlist.rationale: Consistent recent form with a 3rd and 2nd in last two starts, indicating readiness to win. Top connections and extremely short odds suggest market confidence and minimal improvement needed.

shortlist.name: Greenchoice (Saf)
shortlist.rationale: Solid recent form (5th, then 2nd) and trained by a leading yard. Odds reflect strong market support and suggest the horse is expected to be competitive without needing major improvement.

shortlist.name: South Of France (Saf)
shortlist.odds_note: Current exchange odds 1.81, joint market leader.
shortlist.rationale: Consistent recent form with three consecutive placed efforts, indicating reliability and readiness. Trained by C. Bass, a respected local trainer, and has not shown signs of decline. The odds reflect strong market confidence and value for a horse with proven consistency.

shortlist.name: Hazel Green (Saf)
shortlist.odds_note: Current exchange odds 1.81, joint market leader.
shortlist.rationale: Recent form shows marked improvement, culminating in a third last time out. Trained by J. S. Snaith, one of the top trainers in South Africa, which adds confidence. The odds suggest strong market support and the horse is peaking at the right time.

shortlist.name: Elusive Gift (Saf)
shortlist.odds_note: Current exchange odds 1.81, joint market leader.
shortlist.rationale: Recent runner-up finish signals readiness and ability to compete at this level. Trainer G. W. Ennion is experienced, and the horse's form is trending positively. The odds indicate market respect and realistic winning chance.

shortlist.name: Saudi Cat (Arg)
shortlist.rationale: Won on debut and followed up with a strong second, indicating rapid progression and high class. Top jockey booked and trainer in form. Short odds reflect strong market confidence and recent form is superior to rivals.

shortlist.name: Gimmie Rules (Saf)
shortlist.rationale: Impressive debut winner, suggesting significant ability and scope for further improvement. Connections are respected and odds indicate strong market support. No evidence of needing major improvement to compete.

shortlist.name: Boogiefied (Aus)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent performer with multiple placings and wins in recent starts. Proven reliability at this level and offers each-way value. Connections are capable and form is holding up well.

shortlist.name: What A Fortune (Saf)
shortlist.odds_note: Joint third favourite at 4.3 on exchange.
shortlist.rationale: Regularly in the frame with recent win and placings. Form is competitive for this grade and odds are fair. No major negatives in profile and should be involved in the finish.

shortlist.name: Flying South (Saf)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent recent form with four consecutive placed efforts, indicating reliability and readiness to win. Connections are solid and odds reflect strong market support. No signs of decline in performance.

shortlist.name: Easy Money (Saf)
shortlist.rationale: Recent form includes several competitive finishes and a win within last eight starts. Trainer is respected locally and odds indicate strong market confidence. No major negatives in recent runs.

shortlist.name: La Landonne (Saf)
shortlist.rationale: Progressive profile with a win and a recent placed effort from only three starts. Trained by J. S. Snaith, a top local yard, suggesting further improvement is likely. Market support is notable.

shortlist.name: Magical Place (Saf)
shortlist.rationale: Progressive recent form (2nd, 3rd, 1st) indicates peak fitness and consistency. Top jockey booking and strong trainer record at this venue. No signs of decline and well-supported in the market.

shortlist.name: African Memoir (Saf)
shortlist.rationale: Recent win and placed efforts show reliability and competitiveness at this level. Trainer is respected locally and the odds offer reasonable value for a horse with proven ability.

shortlist.name: Oncidium (Saf)
shortlist.odds_note: 2.02 exchange, clear market leader after the odds-on favourite.
shortlist.rationale: Progressive profile with a recent win and a solid third last time; trained by Snaith, a top local yard, and ridden by a leading jockey. The form suggests improvement and the odds reflect strong market support.

shortlist.name: Lady Look Alike (Saf)
shortlist.odds_note: 2.12 exchange, well found in the market.
shortlist.rationale: Exceptionally consistent, rarely out of the frame in recent starts. Proven ability to compete at this level and offers reliability for place and win prospects. Connections are respected locally.

shortlist.name: Hunga Tonga (Saf)
shortlist.rationale: Recent win two starts back and placed last time, indicating current form. Trainer and jockey combination is capable, and the horse is holding form well without needing major improvement.

shortlist.name: Pentolina (Saf)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent in the frame this campaign, with top jockey Richard Fourie booked. Has been running well in similar company and does not require significant improvement to feature.

shortlist.name: Industrialstrength (Saf)
shortlist.odds_note: Clear market leader at 1.81 on exchange.
shortlist.rationale: Comes in with strong, consistent recent form (first or second in last three starts), suggesting peak fitness and reliability. Top connections and short odds reflect strong market confidence.

shortlist.name: King's Quest (Saf)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent performer with two consecutive runner-up finishes and a win in recent starts. Proven ability at this level and respected trainer/jockey combination.

shortlist.name: Captains Alliance (Saf)
shortlist.rationale: Progressive profile with a recent win and a second last time out. Improving form and competitive odds make this runner a legitimate threat.
